content.text:
# 2006 Billboard Music Awards

| location     = MGM Grand Garden Arena, Paradise, Nevada, U.S.
| host         =
| network      = FOX
| ratings      = 6.1 million
| most_awards = Mary J. Blige (9)
| most_nominations = Mary J. Blige (13)
| previous     = 2005
| main         = Billboard Music Awards
| next         = 2011
}}
The '2006 Billboard Music Awards were held December 4, 2006 at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. The awards recognized the most popular artists and albums from 2006.

{| class="wikitable"
|-

|-

|-

|"How to Save a Life"
|-
|Mary J. Blige
|"Enough Cryin""Take Me as I Am"
|-
|Kid RockBilly GibbonsNickelback
|"Looking for Some Touch"
|}
